data.name: Everyone
data.comment: Application predefined role name: Everyone

data.name: EveryoneDescription
data.value: Represents a predefined role that is automatically assigned to every request including anonymous ones.
data.comment: Application predefined role name: Everyone

data.name: Anonymous
data.comment: Application predefined role name: Anonymous

data.name: AnonymousDescription
data.value: Represents a predefined role that is automatically assigned to all unauthenticated requests.
data.comment: Application predefined role name: Anonymous

data.name: Authenticated
data.comment: Application predefined role name: Authenticated

data.name: AuthenticatedDescription
data.value: Represents a predefined role that is automatically assigned to all authenticated requests.
data.comment: Application predefined role name: Authenticated

data.name: Owner
data.comment: Application predefined role name: Owner

data.name: OwnerDescription
data.value: Represents a predefined role that is automatically assigned to a user when permissions are checked against an item that the user owns.
data.comment: Application predefined role name: Owner

data.name: Administrators
data.comment: Application predefined role name: Administrators

data.name: AdministratorsDescription
data.value: Members of this role have full rights over the entire system. All rights are automatically granted to members of this role.
data.comment: Application predefined role name: Administrators

data.name: DatabaseFAQ
data.value:
Do I need to create the database beforehand?

No. If you select Microsoft SQL Server Express, the database will be added automatically. If you select Microsoft SQL Server, the database user should have permissions to create a database or you would need to create the database manually.

What if I check Windows Authentication for SQL Server connection?

You need to make sure that the account that runs the ASPNET process has the appropriate permissions to the database.
data.comment: DatabaseFAQ

data.name: InvalidUserName
data.value: The username you have entered is not valid.
data.comment: phrase: The username you have entered is not valid.

data.name: PasswordTooShort
data.value: The password is too short. It should be at least {0} character(s) long.
data.comment: phrase: The password is too short. It should be at least {0} character(s) long.

data.name: PasswordNeedsMoreAlphaNumericCharacters
data.value: Invalid password. It should contain at least {0} alpha-numeric character(s).
data.comment: phrase: Invalid password. It should contain at least {0} alpha-numeric character(s).

data.name: PasswordTooWeek
data.value: Password too week. It does not match the strength regular expression.
data.comment: phrase: Password too week. It does not match the strength regular expression.

data.name: InvalidQuestion
data.value: The question you have entered is not valid.
data.comment: phrase: The question you have entered is not valid.

data.name: InvalidAnswer
data.value: The answer you have entered is not valid.
data.comment: phrase: The answer you have entered is not valid.

data.name: InvalidEmail
data.value: The email you have entered is not valid.
data.comment: phrase: The email you have entered is not valid.

data.name: DuplicateEmail
data.value: User with this email already exists.
data.comment: phrase: User with this email already exists.

data.name: UserRejected
data.comment: prhase: The user was rejected.

data.name: InvalidProviderUserKey
data.comment: phrase: Invalid provider user key.

data.name: DuplicateProviderUserKey
data.comment: phrase: Duplicate provider user key.

data.name: ProviderError
data.value: The membership provider has encountered an internal error.
data.comment: phrase: The membership provider has encountered an internal error.

data.name: RoleExistsOnProvider
data.value: The role with the name '{0}' already exists on the '{1}' role provider. Please choose a different role name.
data.comment: Message: Role with such name already exists on the role provider

data.name: DeleteCurrentUserWarning
data.value: You are about to delete your own user account. This change is irreversible and you will be logged out.
data.comment: Warning that is show to the user to confirm that they want to delete their own account.

data.name: RoleWasSuccesfullySaved
data.comment: Message that notifies that the new role was succesfully saved.

data.name: RoleWasSuccesfullyDeleted
data.comment: Message that notifies that a role was succesfully deleted.

data.name: RoleDeletionConfirmation
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this role (users will be removed from the role automatically)?
data.comment: Asks the user for confirmation before deleting a role.

data.name: CannotCreateRoleWithoutName
data.value: You can not create a role with no name.
data.comment: Notifies the user when they try to create a role with no name.

data.name: ThereCanBeOnlyOneAdministratorsRole
data.value: There can be only one 'Administrators' role.
data.comment: Warns the user whey they try to create a new role named 'Administrators'

data.name: SmtpTimeoutMustBeNonNegative
data.comment: Error message displayed when the user tries to enter a value for SMTP timeout that is less than zero.

data.name: SmtpPortMustBeNonNegative
data.comment: Error message displayed when the user tries to enter a value for SMTP port that is less than zero.

data.name: YouCantDeleteTheCurrentUser
data.value: You can't delete the current user.
data.comment: Error message when trying to delete the current user.
